name: Sunlight Financial, LLC
description: Sunlight Financial, LLC is a leading financial technology company that specializes in providing point-of-sale financing solutions for solar energy projects. Founded in 2014, Sunlight aims to make solar energy more accessible to homeowners and businesses by offering innovative lending products that simplify the financing process. The company partners with solar installers and contractors to offer flexible financing options, allowing customers to go solar with little to no upfront cost. Sunlight's technology platform streamlines the application process, enabling instant credit decisions and quick approvals. With a strong commitment to sustainability and renewable energy, Sunlight Financial empowers consumers to make eco-friendly choices while also benefiting from significant savings on their energy bills. The company is dedicated to driving the adoption of solar technology across the United States and plays a pivotal role in the transition to a cleaner energy future. Sunlight Financial's mission is to democratize access to solar energy and help reduce reliance on fossil fuels, contributing to a more sustainable planet for future generations.
